Our Services

Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals, available 24/7

Personal Training

Work one-on-one with Michael Quarto, PTA, a healthcare professional and National powerlifting record holder with over 30 years of experience.

Learn More →

Group Classes

Take your workout to the next level at a fraction of the cost of personal training. Our Total Body Fitness Group Training Classes help you lose weight, burn fat, and build strength.

Learn More →

24/7 Secured Access

Q Fitness was the first 24-hour gym in the Tri-State area since 1999. Our West Chester gym is open to members only with 24-hour secured access and video surveillance.

Learn More →
